name: Yeon APIs Archive
description: Simple and easy to use API.

params.text: Text for luminai to respond to

items.name: Realistic AI Image
items.desc: Generate photorealistic AI image with style & resolution. (prompt: your prompt)(style: photorealistic, cinematic, hyperreal, portrait)(resolution: 512x512, 768x768, 1024x1024, 1920x1080) (seed: number)

params.imageurl: Image URL to be transformed into comic style

items.name: AI Freebox
items.desc: Generate AI Image dari prompt dengan pilihan rasio dan tipe generator (slug)

params.slug: Tipe generator, pilih salah satu: ai-art-generator, ai-fantasy-map-creator, ai-youtube-thumbnail-generator, ai-old-cartoon-characters-generator (default: ai-art-generator)

items.name: Ghibli Image
items.desc: Generate gambar bergaya Studio Ghibli (Spirited Away, Howl's Castle, dll) berdasarkan prompt dan style pilihan.

params.prompt: Deskripsi gambar yang ingin dihasilkan (misal: perempuan dengan payung di taman)
params.style: Gaya gambar. Pilih salah satu: Spirited Away, Howl's Castle, Princess Mononoke, Totoro

items.name: Roblox Stalk
items.desc: Stalk info lengkap akun Roblox berdasarkan username. Menampilkan data profil, status online, jumlah teman, followers, badge, dan lainnya.

params.username: Username Roblox yang ingin dicari (case sensitive)

items.name: Free Fire Stalk
items.desc: Cek informasi profil akun Free Fire seperti level, rank, last login, pet, guild, dan lainnya.

params.uid: UID akun Free Fire yang ingin dicek
params.region: Region akun (contoh: id, sg, th). Default: id

params.customkey: Optional custom key for short URL

items.name: Penghitaman Waifu
items.desc: Ubah gambar waifu menjadi versi 'Hitam', 'Coklat', 'Carbon', 'Piggy', 'Nerd', atau 'Botak'. Endpoint: /ai/penghitamanwaifu?url=&filter=

params.url: Image URL to apply waifu filter
params.filter: Filter type ( Hitam, Coklat, Nerd, Piggy, Carbon, Botak )
